roleset.name: engage in legal proceedings
roleset.note: LITIGATE-V NOTES: frame by Perryn (from litigate.01-v)
LITIGATION-N NOTES: Based on verb entry litigate.01. Differs from verb entry because it lacks Arg2 (wasn't sure what this argument was intended to be, no examples provided). (from litigation.01-n)

example.name: litigation
example.text: It allows enough time for the aggrieved party, the losing party, to file within 10 days a contest of the certification that still allows enough time for [the contest]-2 to be litigated *-2 through the courts, primarily the circuit court.
example.arg: through the courts, primarily the circuit cort

example.name: All args
example.text: In addition to his litigation of numerous real estate cases, Tom has served as counsel for several real estate firms and developers.
